summary: A fascinating look at Munich's legendary river-surfing community, a group of six very different characters who all share a passion for going against the flow.
cast: Dieter Deventer|Steffen Dittrich|Mark Steffan Gassner|Markus Kn√∂rringer|Florian Kummer|Carsten Kurmis|Elijah Mack|Matthias Ramoser|Quirin Rohleder|Gerhard Schlegel|Kelly Slater|Walter Strasser
title: Keep Surfing
